reviews.review:
Absolutely broken and unballanced game in almost every aspect.
The "devs" know that it urgently needs polishing, major fixes and a serious balancing update but don't have the slightest intention of doing it, they're way more interested in selling cosmetics and launching a new killer every 2 months and correcting its mechanics as the years passes.
Please! Don't be stupid like me and waste hundreds of hours of your time on this piece of s#!t... go play something better like chess, connect four, I don't know.

------- UPDATE EARLY 2022 -----

Still broken and unbalanced.

My always dwindling joy while playing this thing is now non-existent.
 
The current state in any rank (at least in Brazil) is: If you play survivor you get a virgin blight or nurse with 10000 hours and lose every game. If you want to play killer, have something else to live for and are not willing to waste 10000 hours learning one killer you WILL get a SWF in your face and also lose.

I'm done with this "game".
pretty cool game i recomend it to others
The game is relatively easy to pick up and have fun. Well worth the price and a must buy on sale!

El juego es muy divertido y te puede mantener horas frente al pc nada que decir sobre ese tema.

Edit: Realmente una basura de juego,ni con todas las ventajas o objetos que te ofrece el mapa puedes escapar del asesino , te sigue unos 5 segundos o el tiempo que sea pero siempre tarde o temprano el asesino tendr√° ventaja de velocidad no importa que hagas o porque lugar corras siempre pero siempre sera mas r√°pido que tu.

for everyone saying the game is toxic try this: 

Every time you win and someone is toxic (even if you sacrificed only 1-2 people) just spam the phrase "HAHA I WIN" and stuff like that. You have no idea how much you can get a man to type by just saying you won over and over. There is no debate, no argument, just a sad little man fighting for his dignity against YOU who has mastered the art of typing two words and evoking the untapped fury that lies within all neckbeards.

Never actually call them bad or anything because then you will stoop to their level Just keep saying that you won and it will immediately contradict the rules that qualify a win in their head.

This is not a meme review seriously try this it has a 100% efficiency rate but do not use it on non-toxic people because they are a dying race.
Do you like to hide while some one seeks you?
10/10 $10 on sale not a question love playing this game with my homies

coisas desbalanceadas, bugs idiotas e devs pregui√ßosos. No estado que o jogo se encontra agora, se voc√™ n√£o tiver como fechar um KYF (Kill Your Friends) com seus amigos o jogo simplesmente se torna mais dor de cabe√ßa do que uma forma de tentar descontrair ou se divertir.

This is a game that is going to be known in history as a paragon for asymmetrical horror done right. While not all killers work the same, you definitely have optinos in reaping the hope from exhausted survivors, but they have the means to band together and honestly bully the killer when skillful. 
Very few games I would give 10/10 without being a fanboy, but this one gets at least 9.5. I think there are issues that the devs are still working out, but they have no plans of slowing down until maybe 2020, so I have even higher hopes for the future.
Community isn't always toxic either, and it's full of dank memes.

AH hello! I bought this game thinking it was a casual hide and seek from the killer. Meanwhile the creators put more thought into it. I would highly recommend if you like having a "main" character that you can level up and help your team survive. Your given a choice of many characters with the variety  of perks to help gain the advantage over winning and beating the other team (killer). Would give it a 8/10. Just due to matchmaking timing and in-game problems (ex: players trolling, camping or etc.). Overall a good game, would highly reccomend it. On top if you have friends, great grinder and terror for everyone to feel the rush!
Probably one of the best games ever played. This is one of the few games I actually bought some of the dlc. I would play this if I were you. I hope the game get even bigger than it is right now.
Im so pissed i fucking ask for a refund from steam for this game and they just fucking take my money. Now i fucking hate this game.

Fun to play with friends
bought on sale (no dedicated servers yet, p2p kinda sucks)

hello guys

this game is a good game ok, i mean "i think weve done a pretty good job so far" just about sums it up as the killers and survivors are a bit unbalanced atm but i think its still really fun at times when u get good teamates and a respectful killer who plays fairly and doesnt camp nor tunnel but then...

theres the other 80% of Killers who camp, tunnel and are just overwhelmingly TOXIC. 
other than that good game make iridescent shards more widely available and fix survivor ranking system

Do not listen to any reviews from people who haven't put any actual time into the game. You will suck as survivor when you're just starting out and you will do super well as killer because the survivors dont know what theyre doing. Once you learn how to play and rank up you will start to get frustrated as killer because the survivors are playing too well for you to handle. After you watch some youtube videos on how to git gud as both sides is when youll really start to shine and not get frustrated anymore. 10/10 game.

Pretty good job so far

Really fun to play with friends. It's bloodpoints (character level up) system is a really good way to do things. The items you can bring into the game are also really cool. The perks are also a cool feature,

I wanted to give this game a proper review but its hard to do so when this game is so one sided and is only fun when playing as a killer due to how easy it is to win without any experience what so ever. 
When i first bought this game I thought the killer might have a slight advantage over survivors due to having more survivors than killers but playing as a survivor instantly made it clear how one sided this game is. 

You actually need to know how to play as a survivor and work together which is only really possible with friends as everyone has a different play styles but when I played as a killer which I hadn't done before I found it way to easy to win as all you do is put someone on a hook and wait for someone to try a save them so you kill both in no time which you can then repeat again to win. 
It also doesn't help that some killers can go invisible which makes killing that much easier and the amount of blood points earned with a killer is much higher than the survivors which makes leveling easy too. 

So to me this game needs a alot of work because how it is now isn't fair at all and the fact that you can win as a killer with no effort vs lots of effort with a survivor isn't acceptable because it means the only way you win as a survivor is to have a really and I mean really bad killer or else you are done for. Some might say "get gud" but when this game is so unballenced I don't even think you can argue that it needs fixing pronto. 

So would i recommend this game, Well it depends on what you out of the game because if you want to be a killer then you will love this but if not stay far away from it or you may need to buy a new keyboard or monitor depending on which you choose to throw at a wall.

Le jeu a un soucis d'√©quilibrage, mais honn√™tement, je pense que cela est inh√©rent au jeu. Impossible √† √©quilibrer √† 100%, car le niveau des joueurs est assez h√©t√©rog√®ne. Si vous rendez quelque chose plus facile pour les uns, ce sera plus difficile pour les autres...

This game is super fun, it does have a few things it needs to work on.

Pros:
- Different characters and killers so you can play with a variation
- Easy to learn, hard to master
- You can play with your friends
- Characters can be customized, could have more free outfits.
- Pretty good graphics, doesnt require a good pc to play it.
- Dedicated servers coming summer 2019 will make the game way better. 
Cons:
- You can't interact with players ingame
- Facecampers
- No punishment for people playing scummy
- Many bugs, though i find it funny as it doesnt ruin the game.
- Still no dedicated servers, so many servers can be laggy. But as long as you are aware of the ping in the lobby, you should be ok. Unless people are lagswitching which is very rare.
- VERY toxic community
